verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Here I am waiting; abide in me I pray.
Here I am longing for you.
Hide me in your love; bring me to my knees.
May I know Jesus more and more.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come live in me; all my life take over.
Come breathe in me and I will rise
On eagle's wings.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:

Eres mi deseo, oh Dios.
Refugio es tu amor,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ven, vive en mi,
Toda mi vida es tuya.
Ven, vive en mi,
Me levantare como aguila.
